title: 20 ms ping increase
body: Since yesterday my ping has increased by 20 and has not changed, it used to be at a constant 65 and now it is at 84 constant.

replies.body: same here. usually always 40s, now up to 60s
same i have near 40 ping plus. im at 131 ms. before the server move years ago i was 30. this is bs

A sudden but consistent change in ping can indicate a change in your connection.  This could be how your ISP is routing to us, or just local wear and tear.  Start out by running through the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up comms with our game server.  That should do the trick!
